favorites.overview: As New York City is invaded by alien creatures who hunt by sound, a woman named Sam fights to survive with her cat.
favorites.title: A Quiet Place: Day One

favorites.overview: Russell Hatch, an Interpol operative who takes on the role of father figure to Jayden, the son of an informant killed in a routine raid gone wrong. Years later, Hatch finds himself protecting Jayden and his grandfather from a group of merciless gangs in an all-out turf war, stopping at nothing to protect Jayden and fight anyone getting in his way.
favorites.title: Darkness of Man
